name: Yuukyuu Gensoukyoku Ensemble
overview: Yuukyuu Gensoukyoku Ensemble is the first ensemble game based on the Yuukyuu Gensoukyoku series, and the game uses characters from Yuukyuu Gensoukyoku 2nd Album. Like the first, it is a simulation RPG game featuring data books that contains characters profiles, music tracks, and events that will be unlocked by playing Story Mode.
